item.title: Toronto: ‘The Road Between Us’ Premieres, Highlighting the Divisions Among Filmgoers
item.description: Barry Avrich’s reinstated movie about Israel and Oct. 7 made its debut to cheers, protests and charged emotions.

item.title: Toronto: ‘The Road Between Us’ Premieres, Highlighting the Divisions Among Filmgoers
item.description: Barry Avrich’s reinstated movie about Israel and Oct. 7 made its debut to cheers, protests and charged emotions.

item.title: Oct. 7 Documentary ‘The Road Between Us’ to Screen at TIFF After Fest Resolves Concerns
item.description: The Toronto Film Festival has re-invited the Oct. 7 documentary “The Road Between Us: The Ultimate Rescue” to screen as an official selection after earlier withdrawing its invitation. Fest

item.title: Oct. 7 Documentary ‘The Road Between Us’ to Screen at TIFF After Fest Resolves Concerns
item.description: The Toronto Film Festival has re-invited the Oct. 7 documentary “The Road Between Us: The Ultimate Rescue” to screen as an official selection after earlier withdrawing its invitation. Fest
